name: UpdateSurvey
description:
Update a survey.
NOTE THAT after update, the published survey will remain active and the current data will be taken into draft mode for republishing.
After publishing you can no longer change the OrganizationUnitSetID, SurveyContext, Trigger and (depending on the Trigger) some of the TriggerData properties.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `Surveys:Edit`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "AfterEffects": [
    {
      "Data": {
        "CouponPrefix": "string",
        "CouponSuffix": "string",
        "DiscountID": 123
      },
      "ID": 123,
      "Type": "GenerateCoupon"
    }
  ],
  "BackendID": "string",
  "ClosingRemarkBlobID": "DB422695-4164-4046-8E63-83CDAE00D364",
  "ClosingRemarkMessage": "string",
  "ClosingRemarkTitle": "string",
  "Description": "string",
  "EndDate": "2025-01-01",
  "ID": 123,
  "IntroductionBlobID": "DB422695-4164-4046-8E63-83CDAE00D364",
  "IntroductionMessage": "string",
  "IntroductionTitle": "string",
  "LoadPreviousResponseAnswers": true,
  "Name": "string",
  "OneTimeUseOnly": true,
  "OrganizationUnitSetID": 123,
  "StartDate": "2025-01-01",
  "SurveyContext": 4,
  "SurveyDistributionHandler": "MANUAL",
  "SurveyDistributionHandlerData": {},
  "SurveyTrigger": "CASECREATED",
  "SurveyTriggerData": {
    "ScriptID": 123
  }
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/UpdateSurvey

B.name: AfterEffects
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: BackendID
B.description:
This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ClosingRemarkBlobID
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ClosingRemarkMessage
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ClosingRemarkTitle
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Description
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: EndDate
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Survey`

B.name: IntroductionBlobID
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: IntroductionMessage
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: IntroductionTitle
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Name
B.description:
This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

B.name: OrganizationUnitSetID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSet`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: StartDate
B.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

B.name: SurveyContext
B.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - User
* `2` - Order
* `3` - OrganizationUnit
* `4` - Case
* `5` - Repair

While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

B.name: SurveyDistributionHandler
B.description:
While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

Possible values:

* `MANUAL`
* `SYSTEM`
* `EMAIL`
* `EVENTEXPORT`

B.name: SurveyDistributionHandlerData
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: SurveyTrigger
B.description:
While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

Possible values:

* `CASECREATED`
* `CASECLOSED`
* `MANUAL`
* `SYSTEM`
* `ORDERPAID`
* `ORDERRETURN`
* `ORDERSHIPPED`
* `REPAIRCREATED`
* `REPAIRFINISHED`
* `USERCREATED`
* `USERUPDATED`
* `USERSUBSCRIBED`
* `USERUNSUBSCRIBED`

B.name: SurveyTriggerData
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

W.name: Code
W.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

W.name: Message
W.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

W.name: RequestID
W.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

W.name: Type
W.description: A short description of the error type.

X.name: ExternalIDs
X.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

X.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
X.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

X.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
X.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
